001package org.nasdanika.common;
002
003/**
004 * Command executes with {@link ProgressMonitor} and returns no result.
005 * @author Pavel Vlasov
006 * @param C context type.
007 * @param T result type.
008 */
009public interface Command extends ExecutionParticipant, ExecutionParticipantInfo {
010        
011        Command NOP = new Command() {
012
013                @Override
014                public double size() {
015                        return 0;
016                }
017                
018                @Override
019                public String name() {
020                        return "NOP";
021                }
022
023                @Override
024                public void execute(ProgressMonitor monitor) {
025                        
026                }
027                
028        };
029                        
030        void execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor);  
031        
032        default void splitAndExecute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
033                try (ProgressMonitor subMonitor = split(progressMonitor, "Executing "+name())) {
034                        execute(subMonitor);
035                }
036        }       
037        
038        default void splitAndExecute(double size, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
039                try (ProgressMonitor subMonitor = split(size, progressMonitor, "Executing "+name())) {
040                        execute(subMonitor);
041                }
042        }       
043                
044        static Command fromRunnable(Runnable runnable, String name, double size) {
045                return new Command() {
046                        
047                        @Override
048                        public double size() {
049                                return size;
050                        }
051                        
052                        @Override
053                        public String name() {
054                                return name;
055                        }
056                        
057                        @Override
058                        public void execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
059                                runnable.run();
060                        }
061                };
062        }
063        
064        default Runnable toRunnable(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
065                return () -> execute(progressMonitor);
066        }
067        
068        
069}
